basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. J. Michael and Kathryn M. Steffen Pre-Dental Endowed Scholarship

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to the students within the College of Mathematics and Science majoring in Biology or Chemistry with the intent to continue their education to obtain a dental degree. Eligibility Requirements College of Mathematics and Science student Must be Junior or Senior status Biology or Chemistry major Intent to continue education to obtain a dental degree 3.3 GPA or above U.S. citizen Oklahoma resident Demonstrate financial need Write 1,000 word essay explaining why applicant is pursuing a career in dentistry Two letters of faculty recommendation/support

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
